D

DataSource - Interface in model
This interface is responsible for fetching the stock prices from a data source (API) on a date.
DataSourceAPI - Class in model
This class has the implementation to switch between various data sources (CSV or API).
DataSourceAPI(String, LocalDate) - Constructor for class model.DataSourceAPI
 
dateCheck(Scanner, String, ArrayList<LocalDate>) - Method in class controller.ControlValidations
This method takes in the date for performing operations (say composition, total, cost basis etc.) as and when entered by the user.
dcaInvested100() - Method in interface view.ViewGUI
This method throws a success pop up if the sum of percentages of money invested in stocks reaches 100%.
dcaInvested100() - Method in class view.ViewGUIImpl
 
dcaStockAdded() - Method in interface view.ViewGUI
This method throws a success pop up if stock is added successfully while investing money via strategies.
dcaStockAdded() - Method in class view.ViewGUIImpl
 
dollarCostAveraging(String, double, double, LocalDate, LocalDate, int, String, ArrayList<LocalDate>, String) - Method in interface model.Model
Incorporates the dollar cost averaeg strategy.
dollarCostAveraging(String, double, double, LocalDate, LocalDate, int, String, ArrayList<LocalDate>, String) - Method in class model.ModelImpl
 
DollarCostAvg - Class in model
This class has methods which will calculate the amount of money to be invested in a particular stock depending on the percentage of money the user has chosen to invest their money into.
DollarCostAvg() - Constructor for class model.DollarCostAvg
 
doPercentagesSumTo100(HashMap<String, Double>) - Method in interface model.Validator
 
doPercentagesSumTo100(HashMap<String, Double>) - Method in class model.ValidatorImpl
 
drawGraph(HashMap<String, Integer>) - Method in interface view.ViewGUI
This method is responsible for drawing the performance graph (a line chart).
drawGraph(HashMap<String, Integer>) - Method in class view.ViewGUIImpl
